analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a cosmic theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The CSS file needs to be completed with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be completed to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. The JavaScript file needs to be updated with the improved mobile menu toggle functionality and other event handlers and functionality.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Update the JavaScript file with the improved mobile menu toggle functionality and other event handlers and functionality.
